entry.title: Remnant of Ultraleather Brisa Distressed Railroad Gray Upholstery Vinyl
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ultrafabrics
Type: Upholstery Fabric
Price: 18.77 - 200.42 (72 variants)

Description

What a beauty! This faux leather could dress up any room. The dark gray upholstery vinyl has a worn animal hide look with soft but durable texture.

  • Summary
  • Details
Fabric Name Brisa Distressed Railroad
ID Number 535-3232
Color Gray
Width 54"
Pattern Repeat 0” Horizontal, 0” Vertical
Fiber Contents 100% Polyurethane
Vendor Ultrafabrics
Finish: -
Backing: 100% Biodegradable Backcloth
Fire Codes: -
Abrasion: 200,000
Cleaning: Stain Resistant Technology: Cleans Effortlessly With Soap & Water, Lifts Most Stains With Alcohol Based Solutions Like Fantastic® And Formula 409®, Disinfects With 5:1 Beach Solution. Maintenance: L + Bc: Clean With Warm Water And Mild Soap, Using Clean Cloth, As Soon As Possible. Bleach Cleanable.
Additional Information: From Ultrafabrics Llc, Utraleather Brisa® Is The First Polyurethane Fabric Designed With A Unique Ventilation System That Enables It To Breathe. Composed With An Innovative Aero-Foam Cushion, This Product Is Calibrated For Breathability. Widely Popular For Both Its Comfort And Ability To Perform As An Acoustic Barrier, This Product Is Touted For The Microscopic Pores Inherent Within Its Aero-Foam Cushion. The Discreet Grain Pattern Of This Fabric Is Achieved By A Natural Process That Simulates The Supple Surface Of Genuine Leather. Brisa® Is The Softest, Supplest Fabric Ever. Yet Brisa® Is So Durable It Stands Up To 200,000 Double Rubs On The Wyzenbeek, Surpassing Heavy Duty Requirements By More That 30%. Ultraleather Brisa® Is Most Natural-Looking, Natural-Feeling Grain Of Any Faux Leather. Scratch, Peel, Nick, And Blemish Resistant. Environmentally Conscious Technology: 100% Biodegradable Backcloth, Void Of Plasticizers, Heavy Metals, Formaldehyde, And Pyroxylin, Void Of Persistent Organic Pollutants [Pops], Captures And Recycles 99% Of Production Solvents, Potentially Toxic Aftercare Not Required, Meets The 2005 Standards Established By International Organizations Such As Greenguardtm And Oeko-Tex. Ventilation Technology: Calibrated For Breathability At 3.9 Cfm/Ft2 By Astm D 737, Designed With Ventilation System & Innovative Aero-Foam Cushion. Lightfastness: 40+ Hrs, Colorfastness: 40+ Hrs.

Vendor Ultraleather

Abrasion: 400,000
Cleaning: Clean Regularly With Soap And Water. Wipe Up Spills As Soon As They Occur. Remove Stains With Alcohol-Based Cleaners Like Fantastikﾮ And Formula 409ﾮ. Clean/Disinfect Using A 5:1 Water/Bleach Solution. Thoroughly Rinse All Solution Residue With Clean Water. Air Dry. Recommended For Stubborn Stains And/Or Mildew.
Additional Information: Weight: Approx 9.7 Oz/Sq Yd, (~330 Grams/Sq Meter). Thickness: Approx 0.95 Mm. Dimensional Change: Astm D 3597. Hydrolysis: Astm D3690-02 Sect. 6.11 (Hydrolytic Stability), Iso 1419 Method C (Accelerated Aging). Seam Strength: Astm D 751. Stretch & Set: Sae J855. Tear Strength: Astm D 5733. Tensile Strength: Astm D 5034. Crocking: Aatcc 8, Class 5 Wet & Dry. Light: Aatcc 16E, Aatcc 16A, Class 5, Iso 105 - Bo2 : 1999 Grade 7/8. Gas: Aatcc 23, Class 5. Ozone: Aatcc 109, Class 5. Earth Friendly. No Pvc (Polyvinyl Chloride), No Pops (Persistent Organic Pollutants), No Pbdes (Polybrominated Diphenyl Ethers), No Hfrs (Halogenated Flame Retardants), Meets The Most Stringent Voc Standards, No Plasticizers, Heavy Metals, Stabilizers, Phthalates Or Bisphenol A (Bpa), No Toxic By-Products, Over 99% Of Solvents Recaptured And Recycled.

Fiber Contents 100% Polyurethane Surface
Vendor Ultrafabrics
Finish: -
Backing: 65% Polyester, 35% Rayon
Fire Codes: Astm E 84 (Adhered) Class A, Ca 117 E Class 1, Fmvss 302 & 95/28 Annex Iv Pass, Nfpa 260 Class 1, Ufac Class 1
Abrasion: 400,000
Cleaning: Keep Ultrafabrics, Llc Brand Surfaces Looking Great By Routine And Proper Maintenance. Follow These Guidelines To Extend The Life Of The Fabric: Clean Regularly With Soap And Water, Wipe Up Spills As Soon As They Occur, Remove Stains With Alcohol-Based Cleaners Like Fantastik® And Formula 409®, Clean/Disinfect Using A 5:1 Water/Bleach Solution, Thoroughly Rinse All Solution Residue With Clean Water, Air Dry
Additional Information: Features/Benefits: Features Inherent Antimicrobial Protection That Makes This The Ideal Surface For Healthcare And High Wear Applications. Extremely Durable And Strong! 13X Heavy-Duty Industry Standards. Earth Friendly: Greenguard® Certified. No Pvc (Polyvinyl Chloride). No Pops (Persistent Organic Pollutants). No Pbdes (Polybrominated Diphenyl Ethers). No Hfrs (Halogenated Flame Retardants). Meets The Most Stringent Voc Standards. No Plasticizers, Heavy Metals, Stabilizers, Phthalates Or Bisphenol A (Bpa). No Toxic By-Products. Over 99% Of Solvents Recaptured And Recycled. Weight: Approx. 12 Oz. Per Square Yard (Approx. 410 Grams Per Square Metre), Approx. 18 Oz. Per Linear Yard (Approx. 560 Grams Per Linear Metre). Thickness: Approx. 1.1 Millimetres. Put-Up: Approx. 30 Yds / 27.5 Metres R.O.T. Antimicrobial: Astm E 2180. Dimensional Change: Astm D 3597. Hydrolysis: Astm D3690-02 Sect. 6.11 (Hydrolytic Stability) Iso 1419 Method C (Accelerated Ageing). Seam Strength: Astm D 751. Stretch & Set: Sae J855. Tear Strength: Astm D 1117. Tensile Strength: Astm D 1117. Colorfastness: Crocking: Aatcc 8, Class 5 Wet & Dry. Light: Aatcc 16E, Aatcc 16A, Class 4-5. Iso 105 - Bo2 : 1999 Grade 7/8. Gas: Aatcc 23, Class 5. Ozone: Aatcc 109, Class 5.
